message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $12,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Can we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a fair offer, the value of this product to me is quite high. Could you consider something closer to $10,500?

I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000, which is the price I could get from another seller. Can you meet me at $9,000, or is there some flexibility in your price?
